Messages.Message: Lenny, look what I found! Down at the [orange]Forgotten Graveyard[/color].
This...is the vile of poison that someone stole from my shop earlier today!
I hope not. This is some potent stuff...it's made with cadarva roots. There's no going back after a few sips of this, you'll be dead in a matter of minutes.
Hey, you wouldn't know how to talk to ghosts, would you?
As a matter of fact, I've been holding onto this [yellow]Ghostspeak Amulet[/color] for a long time now. Stole it out of my grandpa's sock drawer when I was a kid.
No idea, I just thought it looked cool. Give it a shot and let me know!
